News.Title: Swaraj Suiting Reports Strong H1 Performance with 72% Net Profit Growth
News.Summary: Swaraj Suiting delivered robust H1 results with net profit rising 72% to 170 million rupees from 99 million rupees year-over-year, while revenue increased 28% to 2.04 billion rupees. The company's EBITDA more than doubled to 523 million rupees with margin expansion to 25.60% from 15.39%, indicating improved operational efficiency and profitability.

News.Title: Swaraj Suiting Reports Strong H1 Performance with 110% EBITDA Growth
News.Summary: Swaraj Suiting delivered robust H1 results with EBITDA surging to 523M rupees from 249M rupees year-over-year, while EBITDA margin expanded significantly to 25.60% from 15.39%. The company's net profit increased to 170M rupees from 99M rupees, supported by revenue growth to 2.04B rupees from 1.6B rupees in the same period last year.
